top_comments.comment: Funny that the thief is tip toeing as if he's trying not to wake the homeowner when he knows damn well it's empty

comments_since_last_sample.body: This same thing happens in the book tangerine
So why isn't the customer expected to be smart enough to take precautions on their own?
A simple refund isn't gonna save their asses. The home owner should sue and recover their losses.
why arent her valuables in a safe... just buy one lmfao
